summary: This bill, the Next Generation Pipelines Research and Development Act, focuses on improving public-private partnerships in the energy sector to advance research and development for next-generation pipeline systems. It directs the Department of Energy to establish a demonstration initiative for advanced pipeline materials and technologies, including leak detection, new materials, and cybersecurity. It also creates a joint research program with the Department of Transportation and the National Institute of Standards and Technology and establishes a National Pipeline Modernization Center to commercialize new products and procedures.
